input.sentences: what 's a halloween party without a scary clown ?
i had to ask what this costume was supposed to be .
homemade costumes can be great or fall flat .
our favorite rock in roller was at the party .
i knew that was my brother in that costume . he 's always the tallest guy in the room .
output.sentences: Tonight was the night of the scary Halloween party!
Everyone was supposed to wear a costume.
The rock n rollers showed up ready to party!
The tallest guy wore a frankenstein costume.
